name: Into The Blood Room
description:
This is our submission for the GMTKJam 2020. The theme was "Out of Control". This game was made in 48 hours.

In "Into The Blood Room" you play a half-demon fighting against his bloodlust and need to feed on innocent lives. Get through the level without generating too much bloodlust or else you may lose control. If you find yourself in your demon form, get to a sanctuary quick, or it may mean the end for everyone around you.

Please enjoy :)

How to Play:

  • The objective of the game is to complete the level without killing innocent people
  • Killing a babushka or a baby will generate blood lust
  • Killing a demon will lower your blood lust slightly
  • If too much blood lust is generated, you will transform into a demon
  • As a demon you lose a lot of control over your actions. The player will attack enemies on his own and hunt down innocent people the best he can. 
  • Use your improved maneuverability to avoid killing too many
  • Generating too much blood lust in this state will cause you to black out, killing all in your path.
